Stouffer's makes better mac and cheese. I had BBQ at Sunny Bryan's in Dallas years ago and brought home a gallon of sauce. It's not the top-rated cue in Dallas now, but better than this place still. Low and slow is the name of the game and they aren't winning it. Also could do without the country music. Fiddles without the lovesick moaning would be an improvement.

chMfxG4i-pwuC4KIGIKnAg.text: A  great  place  for  BBQ.   The  owner  is  from  Texas  and  knows  something  about  BBQ,  I  wouldn't  hesitate  to  bring  friends   who  are  from  Texas  here.   I  love  the  pulled  pork  and  the  beans  which  are  hot  but  good!

kiKRTU2k5p-wThxY5CYlTw.text: Awesome BBQ and for a great price. I had the three meat plate for under $20!!! The tri tip, was good, the smoked turkey was soft and delicious and the brisket, OMG! Melt in your mouth perfection. The beans are also perfect, can't wait to try your Mac &cheese. Good job!

HJXkpR0kalubbdVv5dYRLg.text: Omg!! I love this freaking place- the brisket & tri tip are amazing!! & the mac n cheese- it ain't my grandma's, but it is soooo good!! Fried okra, well another good choice that brings me back home in the South Carolina!! Thank you for finally making it on EAT 24!!!

NQQ9poT1PXN2KISY1sATjg.text: I really enjoyed my visit at this BBQ spot. Friendly staff, clean facility and amazing food. The corn bread and brisket were my absolute favorite. I would definitely recommend this restaurant to family and friends.

sokwL4mn1pvminUr7plW1Q.text: Wow.  Some of the best BBQ of my life!  Everything is just on point.  I had a three meat combo with baby back ribs, brisket, and pulled pork.  Cole slaw and beans for sides.  Check this place out!

tLhxNW8G_Fvz8WxhQXVG9w.text: We had the trip tip, chicken and pork sandwich  All of the meats were very tender and tasted very good   The owner was friendly and took the time to walk by all of the tables and ask the patrons if they liked there food  We will be back

MfSv2ermnd6rSqZhsn2DuA.text: one of the best BBQ restaurants in Vegas.. Truly authentic BBQ.. I am from Kansas City and St. Louis and this is the real deal.. Great family atmosphere and great folks running it. You will not be disappointed. The prices are family friendly too..

1yHA2MVUNnVr1zfrXVgLVA.text: Went for the first time yesterday, really enjoyed the environment. A good place to catch the Sunday football games. The food was on point, pretty much tried everything & it was amazing. Great customer service also!

oTy2IO1etqPfBRXd_a-31w.text: Yay, thanks for thinking of the non meat eaters! I loved the smoked salmon! We will definitely be back! Best BBQ place in Vegas!

oE5oeLdYdte0PbayCs-8gw.text: The decor was nice and you could tell the owners put in a lot of work but the food just wasnt up to the standards of some of the other bbq joints around. They also have a nice soda machine.

yauLXD8Vm8X6VoaxdXopkw.text: Food is amazing. Everyone is super friendly. Never been to an actual Texas BBQ restaurant and It was an experience. Recommend this to any BBQ lover!!

btGUNRGWoQ_AlWgE9ZPFWA.text: Big b has come in and he's sho we'd me why this is the best bbq I've had in Vegas since I've moved here. Brisket is always spot on the tri tip is out of this world and the ribs are fall off the bone everytime I eat them. Keep doing your thing big b and forget about the haters they just mad they can't smoke meats like you sir

NJjJeBD2O7txy1WCiWJ5AA.text: I drove across town to check out this new BBQ spot and glad I did! It's refreshing to have a new non-franchise spot that pays attention to the details. The meat quality was great, it was juicy and tender. This place doesn't smother your order with sauce to make up for tough low-end product. You have to try the baked beans- slightly spices and enhanced with pieces of brisket. I'll be back to get my BBQ fix.

UkGdMdqydjbFg589IwF9Xg.text: This place is a joke, first time coming here and the last. I placed my order, I go to pay and the guy at the counter over charged me, he was so confused how to use the cash register.  I end up waiting for my order which is a take out order while they serve other customers. I go to the counter, ask if my order is ready, I'm told a few more minutes, because they forgot to prepare my order. Wow never will I go there again

Nfkjc-cNwlfKaLJLc4N5TQ.text: Do yourself a favor and come here asap. The smoked turkey is AMAZING! The mac and cheese, chicken, tri-tip, beans, and fries were all very good as well. For me, as I dont eat red meat, the real winner is the turkey. The house bbq sauce is a bit on the sweet side but a definite hit. The owner was out walking table to table meeting everyone, cleaning up, and handing out samples which was very nice. Will for sure be back again and again. Love a good, family run bbq place and this tops them all.

vzLY5JlLyGa36LjH4_2omQ.text: Smokey, Savory, Scrumptious, Slap-your-mama-good BBQ!! Spotted this new restaurant while driving by and HAD to try it! Every single item is absolutely perfection! I will recommend Big B's to all of my friends, family, Real Estate clients...people driving by... Amazing!

zZaJ7V2RREIPhCaJzJceKg.text: Go to this place.  I'm from central Texas where serious top notch BBQ is everywhere, and this place is the real deal.  While I always get brisket, Mom wanted chicken and Tri-tip.  Mmm.  The smoke is serious.  In Texas we have sauce but it's not always used.  Big B's not only has traditional BBQ sauce but also a tasty mustard sauce, which I used on the chicken.  The tables are just like a centex BBQ joint, meat served on butcher paper as is the tradition.  Also, the staff were amazingly friendly and nice.  They were attentive, offered a tasting of meat to help us decide, and then remembered us, bringing our order to our table, rather than call out an order number.  I just discovered this place a few weeks ago because I was nearby; we've decided to become regulars.

hf3_uGxQJMwLwIBoqXM-iA.text: great texas bbq! one of the best spots in town. owned by cool nightclub industry folks show your support!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. great texas style smoked bbq... chicken, brisket, tri tip and the ribs are great too!

Yh60nq21JEuMAhkeODLl-A.text: Best BBQ place in Vegas my husband and I come from Texas my father is born in Texas and he knows his BBQ . We love this place we always will go to Lucilles BBQ in the district that place is a dump compare to this omg great service and food and also affordable!! Not a fan of the cornbread but everything else amazing

-j0eVHNbxdsqKF8ZO85JcA.text: The Hubs and I decided to give this place a try. The food was delicious! The brisket and ribs were lean, not fatty. The sides were good too. We will definitely be back. The prices are reasonable and the staff is super friendly. The only issue was that we ate too much!

h9LuGQr0Dpl2THIDJ98ziw.text: Tri-tip was insanely good and the roast turkey was our second fav!! The fried okra is a must try and love, love, love their fries- yummy!!

6P_DcQ2vC6_sG5GA7rmtFw.text: Hands down best BBQ in the state of Nevada very clean food tastes amazing staff was very friendly this is my new place to go on Sundays and eat and I'm pretty sure I think there a couple days a week also ;)

hnDFTqBTIj85UBDQMNKoxg.text: Closest thing to "Hill-Country"cookin' you'll get this side of Kerrville....... Great ribs, sausage, and brisket.... And wonderful people. Texas attitude, and real south Texas mesquite smoke permeates the room.... Delicious!!!!!

nc3tHICkJfH0H7_Rd5I-dw.text: I Would rate this new BBQ AS AN 8.5 Out of 10 for the overall rating. I am a meat and BBQ LOVER and a sauce King. Here's my review - I had the 1/2 Baby Back Ribs, Tri-tip and beef brisket baked beans and cole slaw and white bread for beverage - wine. Baby back ribs 10/10 amazing flavor moist thick and full of meat no boning around Tri-tip 9/10 - fantastic savory taste - a bit too much fat on two pieces but hey - flavor Beef Brisket - 8/10 nice texture flavor and "crust" Baked beans 9/10 - wonderful flavor with two types of beans big thick chunks of meat and a wonderful sweet flavor with a tad hint of some hotness  Cole Slaw - 6/10 - I love Coke slaw and like it sweet and creamy and theirs was a bit lacking - had a hint of pineapple ?? White bread - 9/10 throw back memories of wonder bread Sauces - sweet red - 9/10 great sauce; green vinegary - Carolina style - 6/10. Wine - beer - great selection and surprised to see Educated Guess as a featured wine - really nice! Overall atmosphere 9/10 - feels like you are on a ranch - employees enthusiastic and friendly and seem to enjoy making their great products a way to make you and your family happy ! One of best I've been to - go enjoy and spread news that this is BIG FLAVOR - and totally yu

WwVckxiFJzJEPKY5GMP9Jw.text: Hands down BEST BBQ in Vegas! The smoke ring on the tri tip is beautiful. The turkey is deliciousness. Mac & Cheese is absolute perfection. We just love this place! Anyone that trucks in their wood from Texas to Vegas deserves to say they're THE BEST!  Thanks for all your hard work, it shows!

6iUZ7KtEQoKCqWyQb1j-wg.text: HOLY SMOKE!!!  Great bbq.  Had beef ribs, pork ribs, and turkey.  All the meats came outwithout ANY sauce on the meat or on the plate.  The meats had so much flavor, any sauce would have been a distraction.   Other reviews complained of dry flavorless meats hard to chew.  NOT IN OUR CASE! Mac&cheese and okra were as best I have.   MC was wet, cheesey and okra was definitely fresh, battered and fried to perfection. ONLY NEGATIVE- no collard greens.  I will live- to return many more times.

zY90O1OJuFsIXOLCCmMP8g.text: Very happy to find excellent barbecue close to me.  You always know it's going to be good when you smell the smoke before entering the building..

Pj2ury6SmsQ-8s9bPaI_pA.text: Update...tri-tip is moist and delicious. I repeat, moist and delicious. Most BBQ joints have dry tri-tip. These guys, moist and delicious. Did I mention the sides? No, because moist and delicious. I'm coming back. Mostly for the delicious, but also for the moist. Go here. Order tri-tip. Eat it. Be well.

EWmwaU-s1_BRrlYKjv7UpA.text: I'm happily trying to finish my 3 meat plate with sides of beans, cheese mac and cob corn. Way too much wonderful smoked meat of tri tip, brisket and turkey. Planning on round 2 by making a sandwich out of the wheat bread and leftover meat.  The ambience is American backyard with country music playing. Nice large 2 stall bathroom. They have sweet and unsweetened tea, too. Easy parking. Lots of picnic tables inside that can accomodate big parties.  They offer pickles,  pickled onions and vinegar jalapeno on the side. The beans were a zesty and spicy heat thick pot of beans. I enjoyed the beans but my pal couldn't take the heat. I thought the side servings are larger than other bbq joints. You can smell the smoker and hear the okra frying.

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. Additional mustard and bbq sauce.
Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. Huge portions. Beware the beans if you are sensitive to heat. I loved it, as well as the jalapenos!
Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

cSX3EIaw1eRCiymvmNqZWQ.text: I am a transplant to LV from San Antonio, TX.    I must admit that I came to Big B's not expecting too much, many places just think that putting up a few decorations and saying they are genuine is enough.    I was VERY wrong assuming this was the case at Big Bs.  If you don't know, BBQ in Texas is a solemn and sacred thing!  I suspect the old "Don't Mess With Texas" ad campaign was really about BBQ.  Big Bs is clean, open and cheery with just enough of that wonderful smokey smell (not overwhelming) wafting through the restaurant. The decor and ambiance is as Texas as you can get.  This is not a sit down server restaurant (which would not be authentic if it was) You order from a counter type area staffed with knowledgeable and courteous folks.  I ordered my litmus test meal for my first visit - a brisket po'boy, with a side of creamed corn and potato salad (diet is not in my vocabulary).    It was a beautiful thing..  To say that I was impressed is an understatement.  I kid you not - I actually got misty eyed!  I was transported through my meal back to the Texas Hill Country.   I won't bore you with a detailed "I think I'm a real food critic" critique on everything.  This statement should be enough.. This is REAL Texas BBQ. All the tastes I know and love are here..I will be back again and again.

2m5wfoeflEdGcQAGdcTTDA.text: We ordered the group meal with brisket and beef links, corn on the cob and baked beans. We were given the jalapeno cheddar links instead which were nasty. I wanted beef links and was disappointed to see that we did not get what we ordered. The beaked beans needed to be cooked longer because the beans were al dente. This was my second time eating here and I was very disappointed. This was definitely not Texas style BBQ.

-onkN8BpH_4sEENfA_ExaA.text: A BBQ joint that does Texas proud. All the cuts of meat are smoked to perfection.  The pulled pork is out of this world. All the sides are delicious. I love the aroma when you walk inside the door. I met the owner tonight and he was an awesome guy who took the time out of his day to just stop by and chat a bit while we waited for our food. I have eaten here several times before and the food alone keeps me coming back for more. I decided to write a review simply based on the customer service I received tonight.  It's my go to BBQ spot ch Cm it out the next time your in Henderson.

tP2zXnfybmydZY4Hyx35dg.text: Oh this is great BBQ! I highly recommend it! I prefer the tri tip, but my husband prefers the brisket. Large picnic tables inside, sports on highly mounted tv's, and good country music in the background.

lBnWJVdHEUcK-qrHjIfOaQ.text: My favorite bbq place ever the staff is super excellent and the food is delicious atmosphere is amazing I highly recommend this restaurant best bbq in the Las Vegas

4OIyKBSh57deKdp2Mu8d6g.text: Amazing! Great service! Smiles all around. Great smoke, not too much and not too little. Crazy portions. Sauce was just right. Sides were filling and did not compete with flavors of the meat. Tri-tip was our favorite. Will definitely be back soon!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

_umYiyc-rcStJHCVQ-MNmA.text: I worked there for a couple of weeks and got too try everything, its litteraly the best place you can eat at, there tri tip is insane!!!

ktLkuTDaFBRsBRrq49kn9A.text: We have been ordering from then through Yelp (and going in to eat in the restaurant) for sometime and they are always great! The food arrives hot and is so delicious! I highly recommend the smoked turkey!!

1_q3EiMrPR6oFAGA6bu7Zw.text: Today was my fifth  time eating at Big  Bs barbecue, I had the brisket my wife had the turkey, my friend had the smoked meatloaf and my sister-in-law had the pork ribs. Everything was amazing and I didn't realize they did catering .We are going to definitely use them on my next party.

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

L-Ozgsa_v6RzT0XE_s9A5w.text: The best BBQ in Las Vegas!!! I grew up in Kansas City and have travelled much of Texas so I'm extremely picky about my bbq. This place was great and the best bbq place I've tried in the Las Vegas area. The brisket was moist with a nice smoke ring, pulled pork was tender, and the jalapeno cheddar link was the bomb!! For sides I had fried okra which was fried fresh right when I ordered. Slaw was also good. My wife had the fries and beans. Fries were really good and the beans had chunks of meat in them which rocks!! Thank you to Big B's for having a legit bbq restaurant in a city of bbq posers. I will definitely be coming back soon!!!

vcto1j0sDBTLq23TS-bP_w.text: This was one of the worst tasting bbq places I have eaten at. The restaurant itself was very nice, friendly staff and great music, but the food just tasted horrible, and we tried almost everything

GJq96Trpauqpn0Y75x6fBQ.text: Great BBQ every time we go. Good amount of food for a fair price.  You will like it.  Get the brisket and thank me later!

Bcl7f8uqmzmVwcVGS1hK9A.text: So good! We got the 3 meat plate with tri tip, smoked turkey, and chicken shredded up. All of it was delicious! Comes with a 1/4 of each meat and two sides for 17.99.  Baked beans, mac and cheese, and with our yelp check in hot potato salad! Also got a half rack of baby back ribs and they were meaty crispy and moist, amazing! We know Texas BBQ and it definitely didn't disappoint. Smoky but not too much, moist but not wet! We will be back for sure. I'm glad this place is right up the street.  Thanks Jessica for being patient and helpful while we decided. All the staff was friendly and checked on us multiple times!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. Tri tip, ribs, chicken, turkey, mac N cheese, beans, and potato salad! All super yummy!

wsBlBYk9FzVqpEnJZXwhsQ.text: Last year I had Big Bs at 4 stars. I gave them the 5 stars they deserve just now. I just now tried their pulled pork after over 2 years of eating there. That pulled pork w/the Carolina sauce in the GOAT!! And you was right Big B, the jalapeno & cheese links are better than the regular links. Im mad I didnt get that last link just now. See yall next time bro!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States
Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. Mac &amp; Cheese, BBQ beans, brisket, tri-tip, hot links, 1/2 slab of baby back ribs!!! BBQ for Christmas Eve
Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

fqMBENDBqB2KgNVNu0S3XQ.text: Delicious BBQ!   Came here at 2pm one Saturday afternoon. Wasn't crowded but busy.   Husband and I shared a 3 meat plate - got the beef ribs (upcharge $5), pulled pork, and the brisket. (As a rule, you must always order a brisket as one of your meats.)  When ordering, we were asked if we want more meat or fat with the brisket (the right answer is fat).   Ribs did not disappoint (worth the upcharge), but the brisket needed more fat (maybe I have to ask for *extra* fat next time). Pulled pork was delicious too. Got the fries and mac and cheese as our sides and we devoured the entire thing.   It seems all the meat was smoked/cooked in-house and the place is super clean.   I always check the bathroom (I think it reflects the cleaniness of the place) and that was clean too.   Would give that last star if they had a fixin's station/section/table - definitely worth the visit - we'll be back!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. 3 meat plate - mac &amp; cheese and fries

VnVvRQH1u0ydL5bbgq65PQ.text: Stopped by recently with family and friends. Great food and wonderful service. Plenty of space available for big groups interested in watching sports events. I personally suggest the ribs (grade A), burnt ends, briskets and links.  It was well worth the drive across town and I will be back again.

PXzApZN_1dqh5-HdYehyeg.text: 2nd time here and i keep loving the atmosphere of a real Texas BBQ house. I love the smell of smoke from the smoking meats! The brisket is so soft, melts in your mouth, pork ribs fall off the bone and smoked just right, the beef ribs are awesome!, pulled pork is just mouth watering good! The sides...oh Wow..creamed cornjust like i remember in Texas, pasta salad is a must, Fries...all of it.  Get all the sides...you cannot go wrong. Stay away from any LV strip BBQ joints or Famous D's..etc etc....just come here and you will know why i told you. They let you just enjoy the flavor and quality of the smoked meats..without covering it with sauce.....even good by itself.  I must say, the owners are doing it REALLY RIGHT!!...here in Las Vegas. This is by far the best BBQ in Vegas, outside Texas of course...where I here the owners are from. I will keep coming back here...I havent found a place that takes pride in delivering the best quality smoked BBq like these guys do!!!  Also try the sandwiches...i was too full to try those..but i bet they are BOMB!!  ALSO, the staff is friendly, fun and knowledgeable. They look great in plaid shirts!!  Keep it Up guys!!..Cant wait for the Westside location to Open Up!!

3CpDKkBHd77MfK2DTXpwTw.text: Nice comfy interior and super nice staff. The bbq is pretty good - maybe not as good as I've had in hill country but it definitely hit the spot and I really enjoyed it. Hearty portions. My least favorite was the Mac n cheese.   Definitely plan to go every time we visit the 'rents in henderson!

WCHmD7KONy5hlosjVV6mWw.text: Shout out to Terri C for organizing not only AJ get together. To pick perfect spot for big group and some tasty BBQ.   I never been to Big B's Texas BBQ in Henderson. So I was looking forward to get my BBQ on. First impression was really like the set up and the interior design. It big open kitchen so the smells were addicting from the burning wood, all that meat , and seeing all the different cuts of beef cut to order. See the positive vibes and the whole kitchen staff all the same page. Love the open dining area and all the wooden benches. Roll paper for napkins at every table. It feels like at family outdoor BBQ just indoors.  I decided to go with two meat combination. Brisket and Tri Tip. Sides went with the Mac and Cheese/Cornbread. Both meats were hell of tasty. Both moist, perfect amount of fat (Brisket even ask if want fatter cut), and seasoning in point. Add the house BBQ sauce. Solid SOLID BBQ.   Mac and Cheese not super thick or cheesy stringy consistently. More creamy. Good. Cornbread was awesome.

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. Two meat plate...Brisket and Tri Tip with cornbread and Mac and cheese

VvCWRZWKZ-SG8SCrQF-30A.text: Alright alright. You know how there are three kinds of BBQ. The one that you put on a gas grill (like most places)and pour on some bbq sauce, the other one is your buddy's backyard which you question if it's even thoroughly cooked.. Then there is THIS place that uses an actual smoker and slow cook that son of a bbq meat right in there.  Big Bs do not cut corners. They use mesquite wood haul from Texas and smoke for 8 to 12 hrs. All that flavor was beat into every single bite. If you are serious about your bbq then you seriously have to try this place.   If you think the sides wont live up to it ? WRONG !! The sides are amazing. If I had to recommend the 2 meat 2 sides combo plate, i would go for the brisket, Turkey, mac&cheese and slaws. Dont forget the sweet tea ...   Everything was really good. ( I actually tried everything, literally)   Services were amazing ! Friendly staffs and very clean dining area.

HTjCT5rcPI4E9OdkXXDzsQ.text: Now a part of Henderson's dining scene for 3.5 years, and Sin City's best place for smoked Meat just as long, it was alongside nine friends that dinner was enjoyed at Big B's Texas BBQ on Saturday, Brian Buechner and Natalia Badzjo's Food and hospitality continuing to set a high standard while former Marche Bacchus Chef Amanda Hamilton has also joined the team as they prepare for west-side expansion.  Still making new fans to this day, the hand-built interior of 3019 St. Rose Parkway attesting to the sort of work ethic that sees wood driven in from Texas any time supply begins to thin, it was just as the clock struck 6:30pm that an order was placed, Drinks from a Coke Remix Machine plus Beer filled and plenty of share plates plus rolls of paper towels gathered for a table that knew they'd need it.  Playing country tunes overhead and sports on television, the upcoming football season sure to see Big B's packed with Longhorns and Cowboys, it was on individual trays that Meats, Breads and Sides arrived quickly, the housemade Cornbread particularly soft when warm and delicious whether plain or slathered with Butter, but best when eaten bite for bite with Beans cooked low and slow in Sauce imbued with Brisket.  Not sleeping on Slaw, Potato slices cooked crispy in Peanut Oil, Fried Okra or lightly peppered Mac, but leaving Potato Salad to those who fancy Mustard, it was after letting others select their favorite cuts that Meat took center stage, Big B's Brisket following Texas protocol with little more than smoke and a bit of seasoning while Beef and Pork Ribs also went quickly with a slight pull of the teeth easily liberating supple Muscle from Bone.    Not a night for calorie counting, though lean Tri-Tip and Turkey make that option available without feeling cheated, it was after a generous portion of Pulled Pork that Dessert arrived, Pecan and Apple Pies excellent despite being made off-site while Chef Hamilton's new Carrot Cake stands up well to the standard set by Big B's crumbly and moist Bundt Cake brightened by Citrus.

dwlC_HM6mpabQICfgizPxg.text: Pro Top: extra side with Yelp checkin  When you walk in, you're at the ordering station.  For first timers, there isn't much room to stand and look at the menu without being in peoples way.  After reviewing the menu, I got the 3 meat combo of turkey, tri tip, and brisket.  For the sides i had mac n cheese, potato salad, and creamed corn.    The Good: Best brisket in Las Vegas, hands down!!  So tender and juicy, melts in your mouth!!  The Okay: Tri tip and turkey were okay.  Turkey was a little drier than I'd have liked, but it wasn't too bad.  No real complaints about the tri tip, pretty happy they had it on their menu.  Potato salad was much better than the one I had at Bell's BBQ the week prior.  Creamed corn was ok, no complaints here.  The Bad; Mac n cheese was super bad.  Very dry, not creamy at all.  Looked like it was just sitting out forever, very old and stale.  Just not good at all.  Overall, I enjoyed my meal.  Turkey and tri tip are meats that you don't find at other BBQ joints in town.  It was good to see that they offered these meats.  Brisket stole the show.  My coworker from Texas told me that Big B's had the best brisket in town, he was right.

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. Ribs + brisket combo
Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. 3 meat combo comes with 2 sides and an extra side with yell check-in!

Wj0GljOHM1Gsf3ZG7UweDQ.text: The BBQ here is so good because the meats are fresh and tender and barely need a knife to cut. Each meal comes with two sides and I like the potato salad and fried okra. I've tried the BBQ beans and they are too tangy for me...I prefer more of a sweet flavor. The restaurant is very large and has ample seating, including huge picnic tables or a nice round table that I always sit at. They have good sweet tea, that is not overly sweet and tastes fresh. Staff is super friendly and food comes out quickly. Great location off St. Rose, easy parking and access to the restaurant.

DVY-l34mjoJu5viy4RM-eA.text: Stopped by because my brother back in Texas said he heard it was good.  I thought it was good, although the baby back ribs were a little 'charred' on the outside, but the meat was good and tender. Atmosphere is very Texas, which I appreciated.

rWgnG1SvV7GydNpsbOtX-Q.text: So glad we bumped into this place! The order taker was super patient and friendly when we told him it was our first time there. He went over the meats, plate specials, sandwiches, all of it! I ordered the brisket with mac and cheese and hubby the tri-tip with baked beans. It was heavenly! I loved the tangy sweet barbecue sauce that I could add to my hearts desire! The baked beans had bits of meat mixed into it. I normally don't order baked beans (I leave that to hubby) but it is now my FAVE of all time! The meat was tender, well seasoned, and overall delicious!  Lots of seating, lots of parking and you get a free side if you check in on yelp!  We found our new fave barbeque place! Yay!

bIZqz79cc-I0HtPezQ77Mg.text: While still known for buffets, Vegas has amazing BBQ!   I planned to going to Rollin Smoke but had a local buddy re-direct me over to Big B's In Henderson! Walking in, you get the sweet smell of bbq that we all love.    The ordering process had an east coast flavor, you order at a counter as you walk in, pay for your food and then sit and await the glorious food.   We had -   Pulled Pork 5 stars.   What we loved about this PP was that it had good smoke profile and was balanced perfectly, every dry bite was followed by a moist bite.   We didn't have to sauce the meat at all, it was my wife's favorite.  Check the pic.    Moist brisket 5 stars -- the smoke taste wasn't as prominent, but that isn't a negative at all, the meat just melted in your mouth-- brisket isn't the easiest meat to make and Big B's nailed it!!!!  Beef ribs 2-3 stars.   First off with the ribs, they were made perfect.  The beef was tender, but didn't fall of the bone - that is a sign or perfectly made ribs.   What was the showstopper was it had a 'charcoal/chemical' taste, almost like they were cooked to close to the grill, or they were cooked over fresh coals.  ( if that makes sense)    To me that was a timing issue, again the meat was perfect otherwise.     Here is why this place get 5 stars and why this place gets it----  The owner Brian stopped by and shared the background of the restaurant ( they import their cooking wood from TX) and when I told him about the ribs he immediately acknowledged it and brought us a healthy serving of Tri Tip-- the Tri Tip was 5 stars, plenty of smoke flavor and a yummy crust around each piece.     Brian and Big B's gets it when it comes to customer service and I will definitely stop by going forward when I make my yearly treks to Vegas!!!!!

hyZyKoyBNkeQvgnCBlAJ_g.text: This is a casual restaurant where you order at the counter and they bring the food to your table. The inside of the restaurant smells so delicious and smoky from burning wood. I got the brisket plate. It wasn't dry at all like you see at some bbq places. There are also lots of sauces on the table you can try. The food is good, and it's such a good value compared to a place like Lucille's.

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

PRo8wcbGWxeUsl5s3S-6mg.text: Big B's huh?!  The name says a lot and from the start till the end it was great.  The entrance has a nice Texas flag painted on a round table when you walk in.  The place has tons of parking and plenty of seating on the inside as well.  The tables are set up like a backyard picnic area that can accommodate a huge party or a seat for two.    I ordered the 12 inch brisket sandwich with two sides.  The portions are generous and can feed two for what I got.  It comes with onions, pickles, and jalapenos on the sides.  The coleslaw was bland, but there were plenty of salt and pepper along with many sauces within reach on the table.  The fried okra was a win for me  as I like anything fried.    As mentioned when the portion are huge so is the price you pay.  I paid about $18 bucks, which I thought was a little pricey for lunch.

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

MUJrKpBVoVl0-Xwaz2-O_A.text: I'm a huge BBQ lover and this place definitely is the top of my list of favorites. A definite must try if you like great BBQ. In a town that has a lot of options for delicious food.... This place definitely still stands out. The staff is always very friendly and accommodating! I have a hard time choosing between the tri-tip and the brisket as both are delicious. Usually end up getting both! The Mac and cheese is alao  consistently good. The meat is so tender that you really don't need to add sauce.... But I'm a sauce junkie and their original is so delicious I can't help myself. The spicy BBQ sauce is also incredible although a little harder to get.... They make it in house and sometimes they run out.  Highly recommend this place to anyone that enjoys good food and/or great BBQ!

RU03F2LzpuRWxBAtXf6xdg.text: Love love this place!   Finally found us some real Bbq.  Texas style. The owner came to meet us so nice food is bomb ! Smoke ring quarter inch just like it should be. Two sauces to die for. Plus they played Mark Chesnut and Clay Walker

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

PzGjoWvyZx-8Dl35ngOgDA.text: Overall decent BBQ spot in LV. Tri-tip was decent but was a bit on the dry side. Beef ribs tasted good but was hard to get off the bone. The brisket was cooked perfectly and was plenty juicy. Coleslaw was just right... not watered down and had plenty of flavor.   Service was very good. Staff was extremely friendly and checked on us several times. One lady came by several times with different sauces for us to try. Ask for the mustard based sauce and the spicy sauce!  Plenty of space in the parking lot. The restaurant is massive and there is plenty of seating space.   Maybe it was an off day, but I was hoping for a little bit more from the beef rib and tri-tip. I will try to come by a few more times to get a better baseline for the restaurant.

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. Tri-tip, brisket, and beef ribs

-qI0--3uRro5SdobQqdd-g.text: Um if you haven't been here yet, get in the car and go NOW! Best BBQ in town hands down. Kind of a weird location but big inside. When you walk in and smell the Smokey meat, you will feel like you are in heaven.   3 of us ordered the 2 meat plate with 2 sides and one person got the half slab ribs with corn on the cob and fries. The 2 meat plates were ribs, brisket with beans and corn on the cob. Next up was hot links, brisket, okra and coleslaw. Mine was smoked turkey, tri-tip with Mac and cheese and okra.   Everything was so delicious. The meat was so tender you could cut it with a fork. The people that got the corn on the cob thought it was over cooked. The okra was I think the best side in the menu. Haven't had that in so many years and it was just so great.   The only problem was the food coma we all had when we left. We all agreed that we should of just got a one meat plate. The portions are so generous. Can't wait to go back. Only suggestion is maybe have a veggie or salad as a side on the menu. That would make it perfect.

jOFn7NNJPcfqc6Q_nKOaaA.text: Omg. I'm addicted to their three slider plate. I get the turkey, pulled pork, and chicken sliders. Huge portions! And it comes with two sides. My favorites: Mac and cheese and creamed corn.  I mostly get takeout. While the restaurant is large, I'm not a fan of the picnic bench seating. But I can see how it adds to the family friendly ambiance.  Take it from this UNLV professor:  Food taste: A Value: A+ (go with the sliders! You get a huge portion!) Ambiance: B Service: A (you order at counter and they bring it to your table)  Overall grade, A-

JKZmpNiZV6FA2n0tMHuImw.text: I really don't get what people are saying about this place.  It surely wasn't bad but there are plenty of other places around the valley in which you could get (in my opinion) way better BBQ.    The inside is decorated nicely and is reminiscent of an old train station.  It is very big and open and the majority of the tables are communal wooden picnic tables.  The place is not smoky but that is definitely the resounding smell.  You leave this place and your clothes will make your car and room smell like a campfire had just been put out.    My gf and I each got a meat combo, her 1 and me 3.  Each combo comes with the choice of two sides.  Although I thought the prices were high when I first walked in, the amount of food you get makes it worth it.  I dislike though how it is an extra $5 charge if you want ribs...Anyway, she got the ribs with corn on the cob and macaroni and cheese.  I got the coleslaw, macaroni and cheese, pulled pork, cheddar jalapeno hot link, and tri tip.    All of the meat fell apart with very little effort which means it was cooked perfectly.  That being said, there was nothing that I really enjoyed.  The taste just wasn't there.  Maybe it's a different kind of BBQ than I'm used to but I just wasn't a fan.  None of the meat seemed to have much flavor.  Perhaps they were just smoked and not seasoned?  They have sauces but they were all on the side which is fine but even those were lacking in flavor.  I will say though that if you like hot BBQ sauce, the one here will blow you away.  The macaroni was good but the coleslaw was way too vinegary.  Hopefully this is just a different type of BBQ than I'm used to and thus don't really care for it, if not, than maybe I just came on an off night.

8NhLw5l_EjJOJ34n--RDbQ.text: So glad we found this place! We ordered the family dinner and it was delicious.  Also tried the sandwich which was SO GOOD! Our favorite was the coleslaw and the baked beans were super tasty too. My kids loved the mac. I don't know a ton about bbq but everything we had was delicious and perfectly cooked and we loved how spacious the set up is. We will be stopping by again soon :) xoxo

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

a5NWj0UxjU9d2BEfnRBUAA.text: I ordered a 3 meat combo today, with beans and Mac for my sides. My meats were chicken,pulled pork and brisket(even though I asked for tri-tip) I Love BBQ! And maybe I'm spoiled cause i cook my own when in town. But my chicken leg quarter was dry and tasted as of it was left in the smoker a few hours too long, the skin was smoked almost black and there wasn't any flavor/seasoning or rub added. Just tasted like smokey dry chicken. My pulled pork was dry as well,tasted like it was pulled and again no dry rub, needed sauce to compliment it. My brisket, that was supposed to be Tri-tip wasnt juicy at all but still had some flavor left. I wont comment on the sides because the texas style meats were supposed to be the star of my meal. Overall for 21.00 I was a bit underwhelmed with my purchase. And if you want ribs as one of your meats on your combo plate it's a extra 5$. I wonder how many ribs I would have got for a $ extra?

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. If you spend 25$ at my BBQ spot I&#39;m giving you this.
Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. I pull my chicken at 170° so it doesn&#39;t dry out.

z8_877uqXCQubo1IMwnCBQ.text: Customer service at this place is amazing, they constantly check up on you and make sure everything is ok. We ordered the family package good for 4-5pp which was a lot of food for even 7pp. When they delivered the food my husband saw the chicken that was a bit pinkies still and made a comment to the person, we were told that because it is smoked that it's pink. The owner or manager came over to see if we want to change the chicken to another type of meat if we were not comfortable if it being a little pink, but we said we were ok with it. That was very nice of him to offer. The meat was really tender, potato salad was out of these world, creamed corn was so good as well as the corn bread.

K6DPBDDemj7EbiJaCYDDmA.text: We are regulars at Big B's, and not once have we been disappointed! I usually get a 1 or 2 meat plate, my boyfriend gets the brisket poboy. Pulled pork, moist brisket, and tri tip are all perfectly smoked and cut to order. None of this sitting in a vat of juices and fat for unknown amounts of time. All of the sides are delicious, our favorites are the Mac and cheese, pasta salad, and fresh cut fries. Also, the potato skins (on the secret menu) are a MUST try! I always leave full, and with lunch for the next day. Not to mention, all staff are friendly and service is exceptional!

DrZ-rUc_tnQuds7eEOBxWg.text: The staff is awesome! I give them a 5 star rating. Very helpful and always asked if we needed anything at the table. The food is good. I had the ribs. I am Indian so I am some what picky with my meats. The meat on the ribs is good but not like lucilles or chilis, a little fatty if you ask me.  None the less I enjoyed my meal with a refreshing root beer and potato salad.   If I had a separate category for service then I would give them 5 STARS for Heather  who was super friendly and helpful.  Shout out to all the other guys, thank you.

9UjVE2UU_v36Q09LFRjMyQ.text: This place is always good. Been here 3 times and never disappointed..very friendly and country vibe. Highly recommended!!

hs_jaczAlrSbcXXyySqPmg.text: Cornbread is amazing, has a bit of cinnamon in it. Came with a large group for a birthday. Very friendly and accommodating. Good prices and a variety of beverages from beer to sodas and tea. You get a good amount of food, to share. I will be coming back for the cornbread, fried okra, and brisket.

4UDGmF6lKCvO_8NLBHfB2A.text: The girls at the counter were very nice but the food itself was very average. The brisket was moist but lacked flavor, the cornbread was dry. My wife said the ribs and Mac and cheese were average. We won't be returning.

FPz8xZCqPj1GgTjdc2Y5Yg.text: They have smoked meatloaf!!!!  Omg it's good!  Look no further for some good beef ribs   prices are right and the service is great.  Lots of space and since selection of beer and sides.  Hey where is the Lone Star?!?;

15ujuoIx_MmIcgARUPgxPg.text: It was good. Wasn't very busy went I went there for lunch. The benches are kinda cool, the tri-tip was perfect.

t7OtwX9EMU0LSB0c76plpw.text: Amazing BBQ! Great food, great service, and very clean. Will definitely recommend to anyone looking to find great BBQ. I always make it down here each time I'm in Vegas.

g_7UmaigX7DehsO_RnvwJg.text: Good BBQ is good BBQ no matter where it's from, and this place is GOOD.  Great portions, really good food, and most importantly-- Coke zero.  Get it before the prices go up!  Here's to hoping they open a location closer to my new place on the east side.

6klOUqkFJGoh7cZWFoLnpQ.text: Food was mad fire. Literally everything was perfect didn't have one complaint at all. 10/10 would go again

daEa1Nkju1z76wnaXGZHZA.text: This place has It down when it comes to BBQ. The meat was cooked perfectly and the sides are so difficult to choose from since you'd want them all.  Customer service was outstanding as the staff are all extremely nice and the food comes out much faster than expected.  I will definitely be a regular customer here.

TVXy68jsDbZC1I9cTcuKDw.text: Im a huge fan of BBQ. A few friends wanted to try this place. It yelped well so I said why not. The worst BBQ decision I've ever made. The ribs were the driest I've ever had. I don't know how you can over cook beef and pork ribs due to their high fat content. But this place did exactly that. On a more positive note the moist brisket was exactly that. Moist.  I will never come back here.

6gZUpY3Sl11HrIyXd3Mc2A.text: Absolutely wonderful experience!  The food was amazing, affordable prices.  Definitely go there for Monday Night football!

IW3sGLeaFz3GDPcvA_4BJw.text: Wife got sick about an hour after eating there.  I called the Manager and he said he ate the same thing but was fine.  I asked him to have the owner contact me.  Wife got sick from their potato salad and we ended up in the Emergency Room at the hospital that evening with food poisoning.    Owner did not call back.  I called back four days later to voice my concern and the Manager (Allie) said she would give the owner (Brian) the message. Brian finally called me back and was more concerned with defending the restaurant and telling me the Doctor didn't know what he was talking about than addressing the problem.  I wasn't looking for anything more than him acknowledging that he was sorry that it happened.  He only apologized for not calling me back.  Obviously didn't care about the welfare of my wife. One restaurant checked off my places to eat

i4vCtdrjYhsIaP7BOFn_wA.text: So....I'm being scolded for complaining about stale bread.   I feel I'm entitled to my review as my dinner and my mother's were sliders.  So yes, it was half of the dinner I ordered.  And yes, they were so stale we didn't eat them.   As to your salads - maybe cover them so they stay fresh?  But don't worry - we won't be back to find out.

Z67FMLGJ7m4gjaZxXnqMMA.text: Pulled pork is decent, brisket is dry and over trimmed, jalapeno cheese hot link is practically a cured meat stick.  Overall the sad truth is sauce is a must, which is a sign of mediocre bbq.  The regular sauce is fine but nothing stands out and the mustard sauce is fine, but personally not my thing.  Mac and cheese isn't bad but again, nothing special.  Fries are fine as is the corn bread, but the corn bread is more sweet corn muffin than the crumbly corn bread you'd expect.  Nothing is bad, but nothing is particularly good, and overall I feel I could have spent my caloric consumption on something better.

USmDKzX24cIU6gLZmRVmCQ.text: Yum!!   Summary: Portions are large, meat was extremely good (I had the ribs), many side options, CLEAN place - they've got my vote!   Everyone was so friendly - customer service is definitely a priority here. The guy at the front of the line that took my order was helpful in walking me through their process and wasn't condescending, making good recommendations and suggesting popular items when I was undecided. We were asked by multiple employees passing by how our meal was and one extremely large but kind looking man - who I can only assume is "Big B" - was one of them. It's always nice when you know and feel that you're in a family-run place!  I really like the layout of the place, making you feel like you're at a family picnic or BBQ with wooden picnic tables and the classic roll-of-paper-towels-on-your-table move. :P  We came later, around 8 P.M. (they close at 9 P.M. on the weekdays) and were offered peach cobbler toward the end of our visit because they don't like to serve it past the day it was made. That was a nice surprise! Also makes me want to get it every. single. time.

1LGgRIizR0AKrPsg8TN9RQ.text: My husband and I have been wanting to come here for awhile now. So glad we finally got the chance to. Loved everything we had. The pulled pork and tri tip were great. Both the BBQ sauces were great too. Not disappointed.

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. 2 meat meal. Tri tip and pulled pork. Sides of mac n cheese and potato salad.

CMjLLOGPYqghXke-jrVCTg.text: Man oh man have I missed my Texas BBQ! This spot is perfect for some comforting lean (or not so lean) meat, home style sides including the best beans west of Big Bend. All the meat is gluten free, the sauces as well, just avoid the free bread that comes when you get a family meal!

GqsVrcUhwMRiPfkHYa3Q2A.text: Pros: Big place with long picnic tables Portions are great Friendly employees and service oriented Potato salad Coleslaw Fried okra ... and most importantly, fall off the rib baby backs, moist and very juicy briskets, and quality fri tips! BBQ sauce was good too!  Cons (yes, there's never an honest review without one): Cream of corn was too salty (but the Owner owned up to it & quickly apologized without hesitation and asked me to choose another, plus offered her favorite) Mac and cheese was a bit on dry side but still tasty Fries were not that crispy Had some dry/tough ends on ribs which they should never serve to a customer No wetnaps   All in all, it's a BBQ joint Texas style so it's all about the quality of the meat right?! This place has that hands down. Hope they do well!

pYFgcy81mPeThtvmb9fD5A.text: I am a waste management truck driver in the fine city of Las Vegas. I drive around the city 14hours four days a week. Big B's is on my route every Thursday. I really look forward to have lunch here every Thursday. Allow me to start with the amazing Bbq. It's . But I'm here because their customer service is above par!!!  The ambiance is appealing and comfortable. Price is average not to expensive but not cheap either. All in all, the food worth every penny. I'm not a Texas fan not from their. I will highly recommend this Big B's with exuberance.

2vaSLQU1Y1Om79leHrM9kg.text: We tried this BBQ place tonight & was not disappointed!  There were 3 of us and we ordered the pulled pork sliders, the po boy with brisket & the ribs. All 3 were so good!  Between the 3 of us we got Mac n cheese, corn bread & French fries which were so good too!  I could've eaten that Mac n cheese until I was miserably full!  All of the employees we came in contact with were so nice & welcoming. Can't wait to eat the left overs & go back.

lixlEJXNefVX9amScEyPsA.text: Sign said $15 for two meats,  I ordered tri-tip and baby back ribs when I get to the register that was a $5 upcharge for adding ribs. Got coleslaw and baked beans the baked beans came out boiling Hot,  so hot burned my mouth.

YGVtcqKGVgwC-LRjBsDYBg.text: Love it! This is a very good BBQ spot! The brisket is to die for, the restaurant has a very cool vibe, and there is plenty of room.  Did I mention how good the food is?! This is a must try.

pqPWCD0mjwK76l0ioEJ_Nw.text: Delicious meat - tender, especially the tri-tips; good portion sizes.Staff is always friendly.  I'm not a huge fan of the sides, but that's personal taste. Would like something like fruit or non-carb veggies as an option. Also, while the BBQ sauce is ok, it's not worth writing about. Would love to see them offer more choices of sauce. They only have the one.  Definitely worth a try if you haven't been there yet!

iG9cSdspgeS7kJH6SxNnxw.text: Came for dinner and they were out of ribs so we tried other meats like the brisket, pork and chicken. All were delicious. Baked beans were some Of the best I have ever had! Only thing that could Be improved was the Mac and cheese. It was good but a little dry and the smokey flavor is terrible. Also could Service also was great !

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

OkZrr6Bc2CcOEDyQu3NLXA.text: We were so excited to find a bbq place after seeing the crazy line at chick fil a. As soon as we entered the restaurant, it has the Texas bbq place feel. It reminded me of Rudy's. We ordered the brisket and baby back ribs for the meats and creamed corn and beans for our sides. Smoke rings on point but the taste isn't. The meats were very bland. We had to drenched them with bbq sauce for us to eat it. The sides were pretty good. The smoked meats should be able to stand on their own, but this was not the case with the brisket and ribs we had.

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

isjwBQWfuxo5BmyPbJWQ2g.text: Stopped in today for lunch atmosphere second to none was really excited to try this place. I ordered half pound brisket half a rack of ribs. The ribs were tender but lukewarm at best not much flavor disappointing. The brisket on the other hand was very tender very tasty but very very fatty. Unfortunately i've been on the potty ever since I think it had something to do with the cold ribs. I don't think I'll be back can't chance it bummer such a cool place. It's also very very expensive

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. Outstanding atmosphere with lukewarm ribs and super fatty brisket

z3eEiaF7mDmX8A98yEFfsw.text: Not my favorite BBQ but it was good. As for it being Texas BBQ it was close, but no cigar.  The service was great as we were greeted by the owner.  My most favorite item we got to sample was the trick-tip.  I highly recommend it.  We ordered it along with spare ribs and brisket.  They will offer samples if it's your first time there.  We also tasted the smoked turkey which was also very tasty.  Not sure if I would go back, being that there many other BBQ places to choose from in Vegas.  But then again Im not from Texas.  However I have visited and had some BBQ that has left me craving to go back.

Q--Jg6c4NKHbl7pljwJ-AA.text: I went for lunch and had a great overall experience!    The staff was helpful knowing it was my first time there.  I chose the tri tip and moist brisket (you can get it not as moist as well).  Both were delicious and did not even need more barbecue sauce even by my standards - and I'm a huge condiment person.  The sides I chose were pasta salad and creamed corn.  Both came in generous size servings and complimented the meats well.    I liked the decor of the place with its picnic table seating and high ceilings, making it feel like you are on a ranch or barn somewhere.  The country music also helped set the mood.   Great place and I would definitely go back again!  I need to save room for dessert next time!

JF36p9uChlTyM2FtHO4qcg.text: Glad we found this little gem.  No frills just great service and amazing meats. Almost didn't leave a review just so I can keep this place to myself.

zl7drPHONuwcDmXG0RgzFA.text: Updated review:   Another visit to Big B's and another amazing dinner.  Place just keeps getting better and that's hard to do with how perfect the bbq is and don't forget some of the best sides you'll ever have in your life.    Previous review :  This place is sooooo amazing. Absolutely the best BBQ in The Valley vegas or Henderson.  Can't be beat!  The food is excellent, the staff is friendly, everything is just top notch.   I have started eating here at least once a week and I love it.

hJMgekzK6Xuq_4a0zKeD9w.text: Another BBQ score, this time in Vegas, they had me as soon on as I walked in!  Why you say, well it was the deep rich smokey BBQ smell that you would expect at a place like this.  Huge open kitchen where you can watch them carve your meats and dish out your sides, plus flat screens to keep you entertained.  I went for the food belly coma 3 meat combo with the fatty juicy delicious brisket, the surprisingly good beef tri-tip (think BBQ roast beef just sliced thicker), and the underwhelming baby back ribs that were under-seasoned and flat.  But they had 2 very good homemade BBQ sauces, a mustard and sweet BBQ that were very good.  Add excellent corn muffins with hint of cinnamon, and all 3 sides were spot on!  The creamy tangy cole slaw, the deep truffle like cheesy Mac and cheese, and the best BBQ beans that had hint of strong vinegar and meat that made me happily pucker.  Overall a solid 4 ate BBQ feast of the Gods.

BtSdzmjagn4rq4xLWR9S0g.text: Thank you for the awesome experience today. I loved my brisket. We sure will be back for more.

SZhf7wZVWSV3pDsQsC_KAg.text: Worst barbeque ever.  No flavor to the sauce.  Sides either mushy or under cooked.  Would NEVER GO BACK. Not worth the $$

1s4MQssE1rIeU3gHMOyReg.text: Pretty good Texas BBQ. Great Service. Love the spicy BBQ sauce and the sweet BBQ sauce. The brisket is the best. Ribs and Pulled pork are up there. Rib tips are disappointing. All the sides are really good except for the cornbread.

fKY1-gzaJasSOcxcwQznXA.text: Great BBQ flavors that taste like they have been cooking all day long. It's great for take out when you don't want to spend time cooking yourself. Dining in is at picnic tables and relaxed with TVs around the space.

ST8jv1ytIef_45gbiVPNew.text: This is a good bque place. All the meats were good. Could be a little more seasoned. I like the tri tip and the moist brisket. The coleslaw is mustard base and I liked that. There are TV's and picnic tables in the restaurant. I'd definitely come back.

wCivAI7o54l05C6cUBBmWQ.text: Great new BBQ place. Feels very authentic. You go up to the counter and choose what you want like Subway. I myself got the Tri-Tip and friend go the Brisket. Both were awesome. Super tasty and soft.  You can choose a plate with 1-4 meat choices which comes with 2 sides. Or you can pick half/one pound meat and make your own meal. Staff was super friendly and made sure that we were taken care of both at the register and while eating. Even though it's a self-seating restaurant, they took the time to visit with us and to even explain the sauces they've got waiting for you on the table.  I look forward to many visits to try all the meats they have to offer. Definitely recommend it!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. B B Q!

qS8qI_cSjMHcvUxTs9yl6g.text: This is probably one of the best BBQ spots I've been to in a while. The service is great and the ambiance of the restaurant with its picnic-style tables is outstanding. Everything is juicy and perfectly cooked, but my personal favorites were the brisket & tri-tip AND those BBQ Beans are out-of-this-world!! I would definitely recommend and will gladly return.

zNCwwmJSc9AO0GLIeomuKg.text: Awesome food,I had the Brisket and it fell apart,my husband had the Baby Back Ribs and same thing..Definitely & highly recommend!!!

Euc5JLRV0Rrfx73di7_kbw.text: Brisket is the best I ever had the first two times my wife brought it home. Now, the third time she brought home the same as the second time (one pound for me) it was obviously the lean or the point. She even asked at the counter because they show it to you. My wife asked "Is that the moist? " and the counter person said "yes." Once home I looked at it and then looked at our son's who got the brisket meal; his was the moist as they say or what BBQ people call the flat. My wife is not one to argue or call into question and she did not look close enough to see the difference. Not sure why the counter person lied and said it was the moist (flat) when it obviously was not. I am thinking they either don't know or just don't care. If you order brisket or anything from this place, BEWARE and look. You will have to do the counter person's job and double, triple check that the person taking the order and the person cutting the meat is doing their job and grabbing the correct piece of meat in which to prepare your order. I have three smokers and love to BBQ. Their recipe for their brisket is incredible. However if you have staff that do not know the difference in moist which is the flat and lean which is the point or they don't care, well, you just won't make it. It is amazing how a place with million dollar recipes will go out of business. SAD!!!

q4voc-wuGPaQvldyCLtFJw.text: The turkey is delicious, highly recommend it. All of their meats are tender, juicy and any side you choose won't disappoint. Unfortunately when we came in, half the place was full of Vegas Golden Knights fans yet they had the same football game on 7 tv's. We asked nicely 3 times if they could put the hockey game on and they said yes multiple times yet proceeded to ignored us. Overall customer experience and service was not great but the food is worth it. Next time we will take it to go!

YxUh_K5ezX7CuqkUGb9tYg.text: Super clean, beautiful brand new renovations and friendly, proud owners. Service was outstanding, everyone behind the counter and throughout the dining was friendly. Food was on par with excellent service. We will definitely be back to dine or pick up when we are too lazy to smoke our own chicken, pork or tritip. Price was good for the amount of food, no complaints, just compliments!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. 3 meat plate with two sides &amp; pulled pork sandwich.

y6hJD3JgvSmLP1nBOkD0BQ.text: This place was amazing!! I'm a huge bbq fan with high expectations! I just gotta say I wasn't disappointed. From the quality of the staff and service to the bone on my ribs, I genuinely enjoyed my experience! Would absolutely recommend to anyone!!

WIzuQl4wMADUDnDj3IWQ4w.text: Delicious!! We live off of Wagonwheel and will still drive there for our BBQ cravings. Always fresh and so good. Everything weve tasted has been great and we love the atmosphere as well. Great staff

8JaTdxudPz3SX-NeJTqvFw.text: Yuummmmmmmy ! I came here for the soft opening of Big Bs Texas BBQ and I feel like I'm eating at a friends house. The bbq is premium, the restaurant is clean and the staff is friendly.   Today I got the #2 - 2 meat plate (13.99).It comes with two sides of your choice and bread. I got the tri tip and hot link for the meats and the potato salad and corn on the cob for the sides. They were out of the mac and cheese (sad) but I'll be back to try it amongst the other meats like the brisket, ribs, smoked salmon, salads...  The interior has 5. TVs and bench seating everywhere. Great big space and decor made for an enjoyable experience.   Thanks guys! I'll be back for more soon !

00ZL5YuqWOrELCPqPprjpA.text: Best BBQ in Town! Generous portions, and excellent house bbq sauce.

JYXJ7Wiro0ABv0qmICyTzA.text: Big B's Texas BBQ for lunch today & I think I found my new favorite BBQ place!! It's in Henderson too! On Saint rose close to eastern behind the Canes. Smelled great right front the parking lot and the place was packed. I see why. I had the brisket with 2 sides. Everything was delicious. The bbq baked beans are a must!

CXyT8GkYFxc5ULOKXa327A.text: Zee best BBQ I've had in forever. My whole family was very happy with the food and service. Can't wait to go back have some more brisket and apple pie.

JA4-mXYMVS3IygH8pleFCw.text: From my first visit a few years back, I've been a regular at Big B's at least every few weeks. Definitely when friends are in town and we are looking for a solid meal after hiking or a day on the lake. Natalia and Brian run a tight ship here ... food quality is always outstanding and service is always top notch. From everyone we've brought here, not 1 has had a bad thing to say which reaffirms our thoughts that Big B's is the best BBQ in town.

FvCYPwIoyot3pooyCvepsA.text: Saw the good reviews and gave this place a try. Walked in with the family no one greeted us for about 3 mins there wasn't many people in there everyone was staring at us lol Finally I found a waitress and asked do we just seat ourselves and she said no you have to order up front. Neways food was average meat was super dry from the ribs to the turkey I took off one star for that and another for the service.

sKcX6eQRRvaK-yethba4EA.text: Not Texas bbq...hardly bbq at all. The beef link is a glorified hot dog with was way over-priced. The baked beans were so spicey hot we had to throw away an entire pint as unedible. And the "PO Boy"...clearly these filks have not been to New Orleans. They charged me an upcharge for a brisket PO Boy and gave me 3 slices of meat and a piece of bread...which cost MORE than a 1/2 pound of brisket. If you want your.PO actually dressed...thats extra...a lot extra. As for the brisket, the lean brisket was fairly tender and wasnt bad. The sauce is tomato based and had a weird finish but had some nice heat without being crazy hot like the baked beans.   I brought all.of this to their attenton. The staff was nice and friendly. But it felt like a rip-off. On a Sat night there was one couple eating, one that came while I was waiting and a man with his toddler son. In other words, almost empty on the one night everyone eats out...that should tell you something.  I might give them another try in a few months, but I feel so cheated by their rip-off and their flippant attitude about it.

qvGTOmDi4C1xEKYd9u4TXg.text: I got the smoked Turkey breast. Every thing was good. Love the open atmosphere. Potato salad was awesome.

RqGqcEtWEvoP9YlCxr_lVQ.text: Secret Menu Item!  LOADED BBQ SANDWICH  Customizable!!!  Great time with great people!  Come to MNF party every Monday night!  All you can eat BBQ and beer specials!!!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States. Secret menu!  Loaded BBQ Sandwich!  Customizable!!!

Ejbt-O0sNrNd0p8AOmhBfg.text: We were in Vegas and wanted to have something different and have a "low-key" night so we ordered delivery from here to our hotel. The delivery was fast,  food was delicious, huge portions and prices were reasonable. Everything from the sides to the dessert was packed with flavor! 2 thumbs up!  We ordered: Ribs Brisket Tri tip Potato salad Mac and cheese Apple pies

Ek38501yWy0molQ-HbC4NQ.text: This was a delivery order   Very disappointed again when ordered something and you didn't have. I appreciate you replacing with 2. But I didn't ask for it. A call would have been better and I would have just gone without.  2. when I called about utensils I was told we do sometimes but really when a customer asks for it.  3. Take stuff of the menu if you dont have it plz so disappointing to a customer when the expectation has suffered.   But still gave it  a 4 because the food is still yummy.

N1Czh0rVdZvaz-zg3OYCAQ.text: Came in on a Tuesday afternoon with my wife and 1 year old son. This was our first time so my wife and I each ordered a 3 meat combo. Had we known the portions we so large, we easily could have shared 1 combo. The Mac and cheese side was delicious and the bbq beans were spectacular! A little pricey for a BBQ place, but the portions are well worth it. Only issue is the silverware. At $18+ for entree, we should not have to use plastic silverware. It made some of the meat a little difficult to eat. Especially because their were no knives. Be prepared to smell like smoke for the rest of the day. Highly recommend this place for the food. A few tweaks and this place would be spot on.

wNsABHclBe38LnekMS8QEw.text: Big B's is fantastic. You see, having good barbeque is only part of the requirement to being a good barbeque restaurant. You also HAVE to have good sides. And that is where Big B's takes the cake.   All of their sides I have had here are great. Their fried okra is good, their beans are good, and their creamed corn...........let me tell you about their creamed corn. It's JUST like Grandma used to make. It's rich, it's creamy, it's delicious.  Also, a few barbeque places I've been to around Vegas have been missing the mark with their hot links and sausages. This place has some great links!   I recommend ANY of their meats here. And definitely make sure you get a side of creamed corn with with. You will not be disappointed.  Would I come back here? Oh yes I would!  Would I recommend this place to others? Absolutely. I already have!

DiWAi7Ee1JQhiJLmLaaAPw.text: We had the baby back ribs.   Half rack was a dry leftover.  Others were ok.  I have eaten at two other rib places in vegas that were much better.  Not much flavor here. Sides were average as well.  I did like the rogue ipa, but portland gets the credit for that.  Two and a half stars.

mlY1bdHWarcAr9FelW8yHA.text: Real smoked BBQ and perfect sides! Tri-tip melts in your mouth and the smokey turkey dipped in sauce was delicious. Spacious dining room and friendliest staff ever! Looking forward to the next time we will go back!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

wPKrdqLNlRX5Ay8wZG_6AQ.text: I have been meaning to come to Big B's for the longest time! My exceptions were blown out of the water! My family is from Texas, so when  it comes to BBQ, I'd like to think I know what is good. We ordered a full-rack of baby back ribs, chicken, mac & cheese and the chocolate cake! The ribs were smoked to perfection! They had the best flavoring to them. What topped it all off was the in-house sauces that brought out the smokiness PERFECTLY. Another important thing to notate is the interior design. They have engineered the space perfectly. There is no confusion where the line begins and there is a ton of seating! Everything in the establishment has been curated perfectly for the aesthetic... I felt like I was in the Lone Star State. This is a place I want to bring my family to. It's completely family friendly and a great spot for a family outing, all ages! Another notable mention is the staff. The woman who took our order demonstrated excellent customer service and was able to explain their product very well. Natalia is also a total gem and noticed it was my birthday... Safe to say this is my favorite BBQ spot in Las Vegas. I can't wait to be back.

QGtVSlXCsCp3mCoZuYNSDQ.text: Read other reviews and almost didn't try it out. Had a friend say it was ok, pricey, but not bad. Didn't make me want to go out of my way. I grew up on BBQ and love meat... The first thing I noticed when we parked was the amazing smoke aroma!! Most of the menu is smoked btw not BBQ, but that not a complaint. My son and I were very pleased and full. We even left with food left over.   He misunderstood while he was ordering and gave up a side for cornbread, which he didn't realize he did. When we got the food and we were confused our kind waitress said don't worry it must have not been explained correctly, which I agreed. So brought him out his side and he was super happy.   We were glad we tried it, will recommend. Will go again. The atmosphere in the dining area it picnic style which is great to bring people together. Glad to have a BBQ joint right around the corner. Good Job Big B!

photos.caption: Photo of Big B's Texas BBQ - Henderson, NV, United States

6LqTGfQy65Rhwb7Zo3Pmog.text: I went in around 1pm and it was completely quiet.  I took the receipt to the register and had to wait for the female in the flannel shirt to stop talking to her friends(or fam) sitting at a table.   Tri-tip was good. Mac & cheese good.  BBQ beans worst I've ever tried. Super dark, almost burnt and very thick. Corn bread was more of a corn muffin. Dry.  Sandwich for bread was a basic white roll. Dry.   Go to Bell's BBQ which is around the area. Way better!

uJZZUr892P-Fo0BZ_IleiA.text: The food is amazing here.  It's as awesome as eating Rudy's barbecue down in Texas.   The owner and the staff are hella friendly and the service is awesome.   My wife and family and I eat here at least once a month.  I suggest the tri tip.  It's always on point.   Also get the fried okra.  You won't be disappointed i promise.

o5pd4aYjA9HpYCm5rQ-YLA.text: Yummy food and it's great to come into a place where the owner is walking around checking on the customers, serving, and actually working the line. Shows a lot

uWQVChF6Tr4Ux1KGeCskZQ.text: Sorry. I had hoped to love it. The smoked meatloaf was terrible... dry, awful flavor, took one bite and left the rest untouched. Brisket was dry and tasteless. Others in my party tried other dishes. The baby back ribs were excellent, the pulled pork sandwich as well. French fries disgusting. Pasta salad awful. Cole slaw good enough. Overall a huge disappointment. Other BBQ restaurants in Henderson are FAR better. Will never return to this one.

qZ0UrwQxkSWra28s8Npfsw.text: our meal was amazing we got the family platter with chicken and brisket they had amazing coleslaw, atmosphere was really cool aswell
